alert.note: Alert for Taliaferro; Wilkes (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 07 at 8:04PM EDT until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Little River near Washington affecting Wilkes and Taliaferro Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring. This approaches the flood of record. * WHERE...Little River near Washington. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 27 feet, Significant flooding continues in the woodlands and fields along the river upstream and downstream from the gage at Lundberg Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM EDT Thursday the stage was 27.5 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:00 PM EDT Thursday was 27.5 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 19 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 27.6 feet on 12/27/1964. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
